article_title: Test Your Smarts...on Currency Effects on Fund Returns
article_text:
If you own a mutual fund with international holdings, currency fluctuations typically will affect the value of your stake. Some funds use various financial instruments to hedge against changes in foreign-exchange rates; others don't.

If your fund doesn't, and sometimes even if it does, you're exposed: Your investment will be worth more or less depending on how the dollar moves against the currencies represented in the fund's...

twitter.description: Test your investor IQ with this quiz on how movements in foreign-exchange rates affect the returns of mutual funds and ETFs that hold overseas securities.
twitter.title: Test Your Smarts...on Currency Effects

image.alt: Take a WSJ quiz on how currency movements affect mutual-fund performance.
